Check criterion contamination (Mirror vs Non-Mirror)

check_contamination.Rd

Compare in-sample and external-criterion performance for mirror vs non-mirror predictions and flag inflation risk.

Usage

check_contamination(
  in_mirror,
  in_nonmirror,
  y_in,
  ext_mirror,
  ext_nonmirror,
  y_ext,
  metric = NULL,
  delta_thresh = 0.05
)

Arguments

in_mirror

numeric, in-sample predicted scores from the Mirror model

in_nonmirror

numeric, in-sample predicted scores from the Non-Mirror model

y_in

numeric, in-sample ground truth (0/1 for classification or continuous)

ext_mirror

numeric, external-criterion predictions from the Mirror model

ext_nonmirror

numeric, external-criterion predictions from the Non-Mirror model

y_ext

numeric, external criterion ground truth (0/1 or continuous)

metric

character, "auc" (binary) or "r2" (continuous). If NULL, auto-detect from y.

delta_thresh

numeric, threshold for flagging large in-sample inflation (default .05)

Value

data.frame with metrics and a risk flag
